planet.name: Pr0201 b
BD+20 2184
2MASS J08414382+2013368
planet.description: This planet is a so-called Hot Jupiter which orbits tightly around its parent star in the Beehive Cluster, a collection of roughly 1,000 stars that appear to be swarming around a common center. The planet is not habitable but its sky would be starrier than what we see from Earth.
planet.imagedescription:
Artist's impression of a planet in the Beehive cluster.
Image credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech
